articles.title: Dr. Dre Adds Two Deaf to Super Bowl Halftime Show - Consequence
articles.description: It will be the first time interpreters have been used during halftime in the history of the game.
articles.content:
Dr. Dre has made the historic move of adding two deaf rappers to this year’s Super Bowl Halftime Show.
The two artists, Sean Forbes and Warren “WaWa” Snipe, will appear alongside Dr. Dre, Eminem, Ma… [+1479 chars]

articles.author: Vivien Schweitzer
articles.title: George Crumb, Eclectic Composer Who Searched for Sounds, Dies at 92 - The New York Times
articles.description: Mr. Crumb wrote startling works, sometimes with political themes, and challenged musicians to employ new techniques, vocalize and move about the stage.
articles.content: Other pieces were equally theatrical and sometimes featured ritualistic elements. A recording of whale songs made by a marine scientist inspired his Vox Balaenae (Voice of the Whale) for electric flu… [+2246 chars]
